original_text: Sick people were pushing to the front, because they were trying to touch him. They knew that he had made many people well.
korean_text: 이는 많은 사람을 고치셨으므로 병으로 고생하는 자들이 예수를 만지고자 하여 몰려왔음이더라

sentences.original_text: Sick people were pushing to the front
because they were trying to touch him
that he had made many people well
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 많은 사람들을 낫게 했다는 것을
